Header.title: Tawebud
Header.paragraph: We build with precision, we design with soul

Why.title: High quality
Why.description: We ensure high-quality work thanks to our experience and qualified team.

Why.title: Competitive prices
Why.description: Our prices are affordable and competitive in the market.

Why.title: Reliability and responsibility
Why.description: We meet all commitments on time and in accordance with all agreements. Your project is in reliable hands, and you can be confident in its successful completion.

Why.title: Support and quick contact
Why.description: We take pride in our openness and accessibility. Our team is always ready to promptly answer your questions and provide the necessary support. We value your time and ensure quick and convenient contact at all stages of the work.

Why.title: Legal employment
Why.description: We guarantee full compliance with all legal norms and requirements. Our employees are officially employed, and all necessary documents and permits are processed in accordance with the legislation.

services.title: Gallery of Our Services
services.description: Explore our gallery of various construction services, complete with photo reports of our completed work. Click on a service to learn more.

tileLaying.title: Tile Laying
tileLaying.shortDescription: We offer professional tile laying services for bathrooms, kitchens, and floors.
tileLaying.fullDescription: Our tile laying services cover all aspects, from surface preparation to precise cutting and ensuring a perfect finish. Whether you're renovating a bathroom or installing a new kitchen, we guarantee high-quality workmanship.

facadeWork.title: Facade Cladding, Insulation, Painting
facadeWork.shortDescription: We provide comprehensive services for facade cladding, insulation, and painting.
facadeWork.fullDescription: Our services include full renovation and improvement of facades, including insulation, plastering, and painting. We use high-quality materials to protect your building and give it a fresh appearance.

concretePouring.title: Concrete Pouring
concretePouring.shortDescription: We offer high-quality concrete pouring services.
concretePouring.fullDescription: Our concrete pouring services include everything from foundation work to large-scale projects. We use high-quality materials and advanced techniques to ensure a durable and smooth finish. Whether you need a driveway, patio, or large industrial floor, we have the expertise to deliver top results.

drywallInstallation.title: Drywall Installation
drywallInstallation.shortDescription: Professional installation of drywall for walls and ceilings.
drywallInstallation.fullDescription: We offer comprehensive drywall installation services, including framing, drywall placement, and preparation for finishing. Our experienced team ensures a clean and even installation.

bricklaying.title: Bricklaying and Masonry Repair
bricklaying.shortDescription: Expert bricklaying and masonry repair services.
bricklaying.fullDescription: Our bricklaying services include constructing new walls, repairs, and re-pointing of bricks. We work with traditional techniques and high-quality materials to achieve durable and aesthetically pleasing results.

plastering.title: Plastering, Surface Leveling, Repair
plastering.shortDescription: We provide plastering and repair services for walls and ceilings.
plastering.fullDescription: Our plastering services include smoothing and repairing surfaces to create a perfect base for subsequent work. Whether new construction or renovation, we guarantee professional execution.

interiorWork.title: Interior Work
interiorWork.shortDescription: Complete interior finishing services for your home or office.
interiorWork.fullDescription: We offer comprehensive interior finishing services, including drywall, flooring, and painting. Our goal is to create functional and aesthetic interiors that meet your needs.

demolition.title: Demolition
demolition.shortDescription: Professional demolition services for all types of buildings and structures.
demolition.fullDescription: We provide safe and efficient demolition services for any project size. Our team ensures the demolition is carried out quickly and with minimal disruption.

puttyWork.title: Putty Work
puttyWork.shortDescription: Putty application for walls and ceilings to create smooth surfaces.
puttyWork.fullDescription: Our putty work includes applying putty to eliminate unevenness and create a smooth base for further finishing. We ensure a uniform and durable surface.

contact.getInTouchDescription: Please fill out the form below to send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.agreementText: I have read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my personal data in accordance with its provisions.
contact.errorMessage: Error when trying to send an e-mail.
